pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Buyer = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
  SELECT
    sysdate extract_date,
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
    poa.agent_id,
    poa.agent_name,
    ppv1.ppv1_approver,
    ppv2.ppv2_approver,
    CASE
        WHEN (
            SELECT
                COUNT(1)
            FROM
                apps.fnd_user fu
            WHERE
                    sysdate > fu.start_date
                AND sysdate < nvl(fu.end_date, sysdate + 1)
                AND fu.employee_id = poa.agent_id
        ) = 0
             AND poa.end_date_active < sysdate THEN
            'No'
        ELSE
            'Yes'
    END active_flag,
    (
        SELECT
            MAX(fu.end_date)
        FROM
            apps.fnd_user fu
        WHERE
                sysdate > fu.start_date
            AND sysdate < nvl(fu.end_date, sysdate + 1)
            AND fu.employee_id = poa.agent_id
    ) user_end_date,
    CASE
        WHEN (
            SELECT
                COUNT(agent_id)
            FROM
                po.po_headers_all                    pha,
                apps.org_organization_definitions    ood,
                po.po_distributions_all              pda
            WHERE
                    ood.operating_unit = pha.org_id
                AND pha.agent_id = poa.agent_id
                AND pda.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id
                AND ood.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
                AND ROWNUM = 1
        ) + (
            SELECT
                COUNT(agent_id)
            FROM
                po.po_releases_all                   pra,
                apps.org_organization_definitions    ood
            WHERE
                    ood.operating_unit = pra.org_id
                AND pra.agent_id = poa.agent_id
                AND ood.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
                AND ROWNUM = 1
        ) > 0 THEN
            'Yes'
        ELSE
            'No'
    END po_buyer,
    (
        CASE
            WHEN (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(inventory_item_id)
                FROM
                    inv.mtl_system_items_b    msi,
                    inv.mtl_parameters        mp
                WHERE
                        mp.organization_id = msi.organization_id
                    AND msi.buyer_id = poa.agent_id
                    AND mp.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
            ) > 0 THEN
                'Yes'
            ELSE
                'No'
        END
    ) default_buyer,
    (
        SELECT
            hrl.location_code
        FROM
            apps.hr_locations         hrl,
            apps.per_assignments_f    pa
        WHERE
                pa.location_id = hrl.location_id
            AND sysdate BETWEEN pa.effective_start_date AND pa.effective_end_date
            AND pa.person_id = poa.agent_id
            AND pa.assignment_id = (
                SELECT
                    MAX(pa2.assignment_id)
                FROM
                    apps.per_assignments_f pa2
                WHERE
                        pa2.person_id = pa.person_id
                    AND pa2.assignment_type = 'E'
                    AND pa2.primary_flag = 'Y'
            )
            AND ROWNUM = 1
    ) buyer_location,
    (
        SELECT
            sup.full_name
        FROM
            apps.per_people_x         sup,
            apps.per_assignments_f    pa
        WHERE
                sup.person_id = pa.supervisor_id
            AND sysdate BETWEEN pa.effective_start_date AND pa.effective_end_date
            AND pa.person_id = poa.agent_id
            AND pa.assignment_id = (
                SELECT
                    MAX(pa2.assignment_id)
                FROM
                    apps.per_assignments_f pa2
                WHERE
                        pa2.person_id = pa.person_id
                    AND pa2.assignment_type = 'E'
                    AND pa2.primary_flag = 'Y'
            )
            AND ROWNUM = 1
    ) supervisor
FROM
    apps.po_agents_v poa,
    (
        SELECT
            to_char(ppx.person_id)       AS person_id,
            ppx.full_name                AS ppv1_approver
        FROM
            apps.per_people_x ppx
    ) ppv1,
    (
        SELECT
            to_char(ppx.person_id)       AS person_id,
            ppx.full_name                AS ppv2_approver
        FROM
            apps.per_people_x ppx
    ) ppv2
WHERE
        1 = 1
    AND poa.attribute2 = ppv1.person_id (+)
    AND poa.attribute3 = ppv2.person_id (+)
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"AGENT_NAME", "Buyer Name"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"ACTIVE_FLAG", "Buyer Active Flag"}, {"PPV1_APPROVER", "PPV1 Approver"}, {"PPV2_APPROVER", "PPV2 Approver"}, {"DEFAULT_BUYER", "Default Buyer Flag"}, {"BUYER_LOCATION", "Location"}, {"PO_BUYER", "PO Buyer Flag"}, {"SUPERVISOR", "Supervisor Name"}, {"USER_END_DATE", "User End Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Renamed columns", each [Buyer Name] <> "Oracle, Production")
in
  #"Filtered rows";
shared Supplier_Contact = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, Query="
  SELECT distinct sysdate extract_date,
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,asu.vendor_name
,hpc.party_name Contact_Name
,hpr.primary_phone_country_code contact_country
,hpr.primary_phone_area_code contact_area
,hpr.primary_phone_number contact_phone
,hpr.email_address
,assa.vendor_site_code
,assa.vendor_site_id
,asco.vendor_contact_id
,asco.inactive_date
FROM
 apps.hz_relationships hr
,apps.ap_suppliers asu
,apps.ap_supplier_sites_all assa
,apps.ap_supplier_contacts asco
,apps.hz_org_contacts hoc
,apps.hz_parties hpc
,apps.hz_parties hpr
,apps.hz_contact_points hpcp
,apps.org_organization_definitions ood
WHERE hoc.party_relationship_id = hr.relationship_id
AND hr.subject_id = asu.party_id
AND hr.relationship_code = 'CONTACT'
AND hr.object_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES'
AND asu.vendor_id = assa.vendor_id
AND hr.object_id = hpc.party_id
AND hr.party_id = hpr.party_id
AND asco.relationship_id  = hoc.party_relationship_id
AND assa.party_site_id = asco.org_party_site_id
AND hpr.party_type='PARTY_RELATIONSHIP'
AND hpr.party_id = hpcp.owner_table_id
AND hpcp.owner_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES'
AND OOD.OPERATING_UNIT = ASSA.ORG_ID
and ood.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'

", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"CONTACT_NAME", "Contact Name"}, {"EMAIL_ADDRESS", "Email Address"}, {"INACTIVE_DATE", "Inactive Date"}, {"VENDOR_NAME", "Supplier Name"}, {"VENDOR_SITE_CODE", "Supplier Site Code"}, {"CONTACT_PHONE", "Contact Phone"}, {"CONTACT_AREA", "Contact Area"}, {"CONTACT_COUNTRY", "Contact Country"}, {"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Supplier = let
  Source = Oracle.Database("COHREP", [HierarchicalNavigation=true, 
  Query="
   SELECT
    sysdate                                                  extract_date,
    from_tz(cast (sysdate as timestamp),'PST') at time zone '"&LocalTZ&"' local_extract_date,
    xxpov.segment1                                           supplier_number,
    xxpov.vendor_name,
    xxpov.vendor_name_alt,
    xxpovs.vendor_site_id,
    xxpovs.vendor_id,
    xxpovs.vendor_site_code,
    xxpovs.vendor_site_code_alt,
    (
        CASE
            WHEN xxpovs.vendor_site_code_alt IS NOT NULL THEN
                'Yes'
            ELSE
                'No'
        END
    ) production_supplier_flag,
    xxpovs.creation_date                                     supplier_creation_date,
    xxpovs.last_update_date                                  supplier_last_update_date,
    xxpovs.pay_site_flag,
    xxpovs.purchasing_site_flag,
    xxpovs.city,
    xxpovs.country,
    xxpovs.country_of_origin_code,
    (
        CASE
            WHEN least(nvl(xxpov.end_date_active, sysdate + 1), nvl(xxpovs.inactive_date, sysdate + 1)) < trunc(sysdate) THEN
                'No'
            ELSE
                'Yes'
        END
    ) active_supplier_flag,
    CASE
        WHEN nvl(xxpov.end_date_active, sysdate + 1) > nvl(xxpovs.inactive_date, sysdate + 1) THEN
            xxpovs.inactive_date
        ELSE
            xxpov.end_date_active
    END inactive_date,
    xxpovs.invoice_currency_code,
    xxpovs.payment_currency_code,
    xxpovs.payment_method_lookup_code,
    xxpov.vendor_type_lookup_code,
    decode(xxpov.attribute1, 'Y', 'Yes', 'No')              internal_supplier_flag,
    decode(xxpov.attribute4, 'Y', 'Yes', 'No')              isupplier_forecast_flag,
    xxpovs.fob_lookup_code,
    xxpovs.freight_terms_lookup_code,
    (
        CASE
            WHEN (
                SELECT
                    COUNT(1)
                FROM
                    apps.hz_relationships    hr1,
                    apps.hz_parties          hp1,
                    apps.fnd_user            fu
                WHERE
                        1 = 1
                    AND hr1.object_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES'
                    AND hr1.object_type = 'ORGANIZATION'
                    AND hp1.party_id = hr1.object_id
                    AND fu.person_party_id = hr1.subject_id
                    AND xxpov.party_id = hp1.party_id
                    AND nvl(fu.end_date, sysdate + 1) > sysdate
            ) > 0 THEN
                'Yes'
            ELSE
                'No'
        END
    ) isupplier_flag,
    apt.name                                                 payment_term,
    CASE
        WHEN nvl((
            SELECT
                MIN(poa.creation_date)
            FROM
                apps.po_acceptances_v    poa, po.po_headers_all        pha
            WHERE
                    pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                AND pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                AND poa.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id
                AND pha.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
                AND poa.accepting_party = 'S'
        ), sysdate) > nvl((
            SELECT
                MIN(poa.creation_date)
            FROM
                apps.po_acceptances_v    poa, po.po_releases_all       pra, po.po_headers_all        pha
            WHERE
                    pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                AND pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                AND poa.po_release_id = pra.po_release_id
                AND pha.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
                AND poa.accepting_party = 'S'
                AND pha.po_header_id = pra.po_header_id
        ), sysdate) THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    MIN(poa.creation_date)
                FROM
                    apps.po_acceptances_v    poa,
                    po.po_releases_all       pra,
                    po.po_headers_all        pha
                WHERE
                        pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                    AND pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                    AND poa.po_release_id = pra.po_release_id
                    AND pha.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
                    AND poa.accepting_party = 'S'
                    AND pha.po_header_id = pra.po_header_id
            )
        ELSE
            (
                SELECT
                    MIN(poa.creation_date)
                FROM
                    apps.po_acceptances_v    poa,
                    po.po_headers_all        pha
                WHERE
                        pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                    AND pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                    AND poa.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id
                    AND pha.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
                    AND poa.accepting_party = 'S'
            )
    END first_po_acceptance,
    CASE
        WHEN nvl((
            SELECT
                MAX(poa.creation_date)
            FROM
                apps.po_acceptances_v    poa, po.po_headers_all        pha
            WHERE
                    pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                AND pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                AND poa.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id
                AND pha.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
                AND poa.accepting_party = 'S'
        ), sysdate) > nvl((
            SELECT
                MIN(poa.creation_date)
            FROM
                apps.po_acceptances_v    poa, 
                po.po_releases_all       pra, 
                po.po_headers_all        pha
            WHERE
                    pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                AND pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                AND poa.po_release_id = pra.po_release_id
                AND pha.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
                AND poa.accepting_party = 'S'
                AND pha.po_header_id = pra.po_header_id
        ), sysdate) THEN
            (
                SELECT
                    MAX(poa.creation_date)
                FROM
                    apps.po_acceptances_v    poa,
                    po.po_releases_all       pra,
                    po.po_headers_all        pha
                WHERE
                        pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                    AND pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                    AND poa.po_release_id = pra.po_release_id
                    AND pha.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
                    AND poa.accepting_party = 'S'
                    AND pha.po_header_id = pra.po_header_id
            )
        ELSE
            (
                SELECT
                    MAX(poa.creation_date)
                FROM
                    apps.po_acceptances_v    poa,
                    po.po_headers_all        pha
                WHERE
                        pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                    AND pha.vendor_id = xxpov.vendor_id
                    AND poa.po_header_id = pha.po_header_id
                    AND pha.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
                    AND poa.accepting_party = 'S'
            )
    END last_po_acceptance,
    (
        SELECT
            MAX(api.invoice_date)
        FROM
            apps.ap_invoices_all api
        WHERE
                api.org_id = xxpovs.org_id
            AND api.vendor_site_id = xxpovs.vendor_site_id
    ) last_invoice_date,
    (
        SELECT
            COUNT(1)
        FROM
            apps.hz_relationships    hr1,
            apps.hz_parties          hp1,
            apps.fnd_user            fu
        WHERE
                1 = 1
            AND hr1.object_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES'
            AND hr1.object_type = 'ORGANIZATION'
            AND hp1.party_id = hr1.object_id
            AND fu.person_party_id = hr1.subject_id
            AND xxpov.party_id = hp1.party_id
            AND nvl(fu.end_date, sysdate + 1) > sysdate
    ) isupplier_user_count,
    xxpov.attribute5                                         supplier_class,
    nvl(xxvd.vendor_category, 'Unassigned')                  supplier_category,
    nvl(xxvd.ssm_lead, 'Unassigned')                         ssm_lead,
    nvl(xxvd.master_vendor_name, xxpov.vendor_name)          master_supplier,
    nvl(xxvd.attribute1, 'NA')                               key_and_risk_flag,
    decode(xxvd.attribute2, 'Y', 'Yes', 'No')                kpi_flag
FROM
    apps.po_vendors                      xxpov,
    apps.po_vendor_sites_all             xxpovs,
    apps.org_organization_definitions    ood,
    apps.hr_operating_units              hou,
    apps.ap_terms_v                      apt,
    xxdims.xx_vendor_dim                 xxvd
WHERE
        1 = 1
    AND xxpov.employee_id IS NULL
    AND xxpov.vendor_id = xxpovs.vendor_id
    AND xxpovs.org_id = ood.operating_unit
    AND hou.organization_id = ood.operating_unit
    AND xxpovs.terms_id = apt.term_id (+)
    AND xxpov.vendor_id = xxvd.vendor_id (+)
    AND ood.organization_code = '"&ORG&"'
", CommandTimeout=#duration(0, 0, 10, 0)]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"EXTRACT_DATE", "Extract Date"}, {"SUPPLIER_CREATION_DATE", "Supplier Creation Date"}, {"SUPPLIER_LAST_UPDATE_DATE", "Supplier Last Update Date"}, {"SUPPLIER_NUMBER", "Supplier Number"}, {"VENDOR_NAME", "Supplier Name"}, {"VENDOR_NAME_ALT", "Supplier Name Alternate"}, {"VENDOR_SITE_CODE", "Supplier Site Code"}, {"VENDOR_SITE_CODE_ALT", "Supplier Site Code Alternate"}, {"PRODUCTION_SUPPLIER_FLAG", "Production Supplier Flag"}, {"PAY_SITE_FLAG", "Pay Site Flag"}, {"PURCHASING_SITE_FLAG", "Purchasing Site Flag"}, {"CITY", "City"}, {"COUNTRY", "Country"}, {"COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN_CODE", "Country of Origin"}, {"ACTIVE_SUPPLIER_FLAG", "Active Supplier Flag"}, {"INACTIVE_DATE", "Inactive Date"}, {"INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE", "Invoice Currency"}, {"PAYMENT_CURRENCY_CODE", "Payment Currency"}, {"PAYMENT_METHOD_LOOKUP_CODE", "Payment Method"}, {"VENDOR_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE", "Supplier Type"}, {"ISUPPLIER_FORECAST_FLAG", "ISupplier Forecast Flag"}, {"FOB_LOOKUP_CODE", "FOB"}, {"FREIGHT_TERMS_LOOKUP_CODE", "Freight Term"}, {"PAYMENT_TERM", "Payment Term"}, {"ISUPPLIER_FLAG", "ISupplier Flag"}, {"FIRST_PO_ACCEPTANCE", "ISupplier First Acceptance"}, {"LAST_PO_ACCEPTANCE", "ISupplier Last Acceptance"}, {"INTERNAL_SUPPLIER_FLAG", "Internal Supplier Flag"}, {"LAST_INVOICE_DATE", "Last Invoice Date"}, {"ISUPPLIER_USER_COUNT", "ISupplier User Count"}, {"SUPPLIER_CLASS", "Supplier Class"}, {"SSM_LEAD", "SSM Lead"}, {"SUPPLIER_CATEGORY", "Supplier Category"}, {"MASTER_SUPPLIER", "Master Supplier"}, {"KEY_AND_RISK_FLAG", "Key and Risk Flag"}, {"KPI_FLAG", "KPI Required Flag"}, {"LOCAL_EXTRACT_DATE", "Local Extract Date"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "GEP" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
shared LocalTZ = let
  Local = "Europe/Berlin" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  Local;
